L

lastOrderID - Static variable in class ResourceRequest
Global incrementer that ensures each order on this node has an unique ID (IDs outside of a node are used in conjunction with the address of the node that handles a particular request, so there is no possibility for IDs to be non unique)
lastRedirIndex - Variable in class NetworkNode
keeps track of which node to redirect incoming connections to next if this node is full

locked - Variable in class ResourceRequest
Key = node address Value = map of key: locked type, val: locked amount
lockedAmount - Variable in class NetworkResource
The amount of the resource that is locked but not yet allocated

T

TCPServer - Class in tcpudp_lib
TCPServer is a multithreaded ServerSocket wrapper that can respond to requests from multiple clients at once, using a predetermined callback.
TCPServer(int) - Constructor for class tcpudp_lib.TCPServer
Creates a server instance, one which will reply to all incoming requests putting them through the given callback function
